review: My Experience with Dr Shruti Goyal was amazing. I went for my Daughter's braces treatment. The whole one year treatment was hassle free. She is very polite and soft spoken. The process was as painless as possible. I am very happy and satisfied with the results too.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited here for my teeth discoloration treatment. Dr.shruti suggested me for veneers on front teeth & I went for the procedure of smile designing & whole treatment was nicely & comfortably done. It's been one month now & teeth & smile looks perfect & complete change of my smile. Doctor & staff of this clinic were very co operative & nice behaviour. Thank you doc. & Highly recommended the doctor & clinic for all kind of dental problem.

review: Dr explained  the treatment  required  . Maintained  hygiene  during the treatment.  She is very polite  and made me feel  comfortable  before  starting  the treatment.  She is professional and has  lot of patience. She knows  her subject.  Generally  one experiences  lot of pain during  the  extraction  of  tooth . But today  she removed  my tooth  without  pain  it was a  amazing  experience.  I stay in Gurgaon  but come all the way to her clinic  in Rohini Delhi. I am sure you will maintain  the same  attitude  and  standards.  May God  bless  you.  All the  best.
